      Parameters:
      docId - id of the document to be inserted

      Returns:

    • querySimilars

      public io.vavr.control.Option<io.vavr.collection.HashMap<DocId,Double>> querySimilars(DocId docId)
      Parameters:
      docId -
      Returns:
      mapping doc_id -> cosine_similarity for all documents with similarity > 0 with docId

    • querySimilars

      public io.vavr.collection.HashMap<DocId,Double> querySimilars(io.vavr.collection.HashMap<String,Double> termsWeights)
      Parameters:
      termsWeights - a (not necessarily normalized) terms+weights vector
      Returns:
      mapping doc_id -> cosine_similarity for all documents with similarity > 0 with the given (term, tfidf weight) vector
